data.title: Worst Barry Darsow character
data.meta_description: I completely lost interest after Demolition and admittedly didn’t watch much in his Repo and Blacktop Bully Days.  So which character did you find the worst and why?  The three all seemed
data.text:
Post by willywonka666 on

I completely lost interest after Demolition and admittedly didn’t watch much in his Repo and Blacktop Bully Days.

So which character did you find the worst and why?

The three all seemed silly to me, but the worst seems to be his golfing personae in my book

Post by Johnny B. Decent on

The Blacktop Bully made some sense to me, because yeah, you can see some big truck driver getting into wrestling, but a wrestling golfer?

Post by ThankGodForSidJustice on

I went with Blacktop Bully. Repo Man and Hole in One were so over the top and ridiculous that they were entertaining in a campy way. Bully was just kind of boring and it also seemed like they were actually trying to push him as a legit upper midcard heel which was way above his station as Darsow post 1990 was pretty awful in the ring. With Repo and Whole in One he was lower card heel who put the faces over which was the perfect spot for him.

Post by Ecks Ecks Ringout Ecks Ecks on

I sorta enjoyed both Repo Man and Blacktop Bully.

The golf gimmick was just lame. At least "thief" and "trucker" conveyed a certain amount of badassery.

Post by Deleted on

I loved them all.

Interestingly enough, I listened to a shoot several years ago and he couldn't remember doing the Hole in One Darsaw gimmick. The interviewer had to explain it to him.

Post by toodarkmark on

I actually love Hole In One and enjoy Blacktop in retrospect. I HATED the Repoman gimmick. Like when he stole a womans watch and Roddy Piper tried to get it back. I wanted to vomit I thought it was so stupid. Loved Smash and Krusher Kruschev also.

Post by Surfer Sandman on

None of them?

Seriously, he made me laugh no matter what role he was in, even the Hole in One character!

Post by Deleted on

I posted about this before but evil golfer could be an incredible lower card gimmick if done correctly.

Post by Joe Neglia on

I choose "Other" for I give unto all of you...Zar the Mongolian!

Post by Deleted on

I’m voting Krusher Kruschev for being the most half-assed Russian gimmick this side of the masked Russian Assassin.

At least Hole In One and Blacktop Bully were comical. Repo Man is a legend.

Post by Joe Neglia on

@akeemresurrection said:

I’m voting Krusher Kruschev for being the most half-assed Russian gimmick this side of the masked Russian Assassin.

Kruschev was never presented as Russian, but as an American ex-patriot who defected to the commie side. There was even an angle where he renounced his American citizenship and the Crusher Darsow gimmick, rechristening himself Krusher Kruschev.

Post by Deleted on

@akeemresurrection said:

I’m voting Krusher Kruschev for being the most half-assed Russian gimmick this side of the masked Russian Assassin.

Kruschev was never presented as Russian, but as an American ex-patriot who defected to the commie side. There was even an angle where he renounced his American citizenship and the Crusher Darsow gimmick, rechristening himself Krusher Kruschev.

Well damn, guess I need to bone up on 80s stuff. Thank you.

Post by thecrusherwi on

Trick question. All Barry Darsows are the best. Seriously he’s one of my favorite midcard acts in history. Even as plain trunks jobber to the stars Barry Darsow in WCW he was one of my favorite parts of the show. He always played to the crowd in entertaining fashion and his work was simple yet effective. And he’s a great guy to boot. Barry Darsow is the man.

Post by DASH 243✅ on

Remember before he was home in one, he was Stewart pain. But golfer Payne Stewart passed and he changed it to hold on one.
